keyPolicies.policyDescription: Work to ensure the recovery is green and continues the progress on climate change.
Work to protect our NHS and see services such as dentistry delivered throughout the isles.
Work for continued financial support for businesses and individuals.
SNP pledges to continue to build new vessels (£580 million) and cut fares in half (50% active travel).

issues.brexitEurope: Continue to oppose Brexit as bad for us.
issues.health: Protect our NHS and improve local services like dentistry.

leaflet.personalStatement: Every vote is important. Vote for who puts Na h-Eileanan an Iar first - Angus MacNeil has a track record of hard work and results.

politicalExperience.role: MP for Na h-Eileanan an Iar
politicalExperience.achievements: Helped secure millions in support for our economy, associated with the Spaceport and Deep Sea projects.

quotes.text: We need him to continue the good work he starts.

images.caption: Angus with First Minister Nicola Sturgeon.
Angus MacNeil with the SNP logo.
Angus MacNeil at a coastal area.
Angus MacNeil with individuals in a casual setting.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Angus has a track record of hard work and results.
